name: core_supply_chain_management_evaluation
description: Test core supply chain management features including suppliers, procurement, and logistics

steps.expected: Homepage should load without errors and display supply chain management platform with professional design
User authentication system should load with role-based access control (executives, managers, staff, suppliers)
Executive dashboard should display supply chain overview, KPIs, and strategic insights
Supplier management system should load with qualification, performance tracking, and contract management
Should provide supplier qualification, performance tracking, and contract management capabilities
Order processing and procurement system should load with automated workflows, approval processes, and cost optimization
Should display automated workflows, approval processes, and cost optimization for procurement
Logistics coordination system should load with route optimization, carrier management, and shipment tracking
Should provide route optimization, carrier management, and shipment tracking capabilities
Inventory tracking and warehouse management should load with real-time visibility, demand forecasting, and optimization
